name: Rob Fletcher
body:
## Open source projects

[Spock JDBC](/spock-jdbc) -- JDBC extensions for [Spock](http://spockframework.org/).

[Discordian Calendar](https://github.com/robfletcher/discordian-calendar) -- An implementation of the [Discordian Calendar](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discordian_calendar) for the Java 8 time API.

[JDBI Time](https://github.com/robfletcher/jdbi-time) -- JDBI adapters for the Java 8 time API.

[Gradle Compass](https://github.com/robfletcher/gradle-compass) -- A SASS / Compass plugin for Gradle.

[Midcentury Ipsum](http://midcentury-ipsum.herokuapp.com/) -- Swingin' filler text for your jet-age web page.

[Font Taxonomy](/font-taxonomy) -- Free font showcase.

---
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
